title: Exoskeletons help take the strain of heavy lifting
description: BBC Click’s Lara Lewington visits a distribution centre to see the wearable robotic suits in action.

title: ADHD and the trend to self-diagnose by TikTok
description: How the hashtag #ADHD has helped and hindered people.

title: AI suggests beer based on taster facial expressions
description: Aromyx analyses how a person responds to three sample drinks before tailoring its recommendations.

title: Tech layoffs: Yahoo to slash 20% of its workforce
description: Yahoo joins the growing list of tech companies cutting jobs as consumer and corporate spending shrink.

title: Can we make the internet less power-thirsty?
description: New technology promises to ease the strain caused by energy-guzzling data centres.
